synopsis.text: Mimori's smartphone, seized by a ruthless Shadowverse player, sets Hiiro Ryugasaki on an electrifying journey in the world of digital card gaming. As a student at Tensei Academy, Hiiro stumbles upon a mysterious smartphone that comes pre-installed with the popular game, Shadowverse. Little does he know that this discovery will lead him to form new bonds, face formidable opponents, and compete in intense tournaments. With a completely original story and anime-only characters, the Shadowverse anime series promises a thrilling adventure filled with riveting matches and personal growth for Hiiro as he evolves through his experiences.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
